ping.description: Let Axel show the situation of the clusters

uptime.description: See how long Axel has been online!

lang.description: Change the default language of Axel on your server

eval.description: Make Axel do anything for you via a line of code - Developers only

store.description: Spend your coins in the store!

ban-list.description: See all banned members from the server

setprefix.description: Change the Axel default prefix on the server

saldo.description: See how much coins you own

serverinfo.description: See some information about the guild

bio.description: Put a biography for your profile

laranjo.description: Say something for the orange to speak

invert.syntax: <prefix>invert [User : Username of user : Nickname : Attached File : ID of User : Image URL]
invert.description: Invert the colors of an image

cep.description: Consult a zip code of Brazil!

create.description: Create a text channel, voice channel, category or role on the server!
create.usage:
{{<prefix>}}create voice hi
{{<prefix>}}create text hi
{{<prefix>}}create category hi
{{<prefix>}}create role idk #20F052
{{<prefix>}}create role bababoey+role #20F052

docs.description: Look for something in the Discord.js documentation - Useful for discord developers using Discord.js

github.description: View information from a github profile

npm.description: See some information about an npm dependency - Useful for Node.js developers

weather.description: See the climate of a city

empresa.description: Log out, log in, create or view company information! - BETA
empresa.usage:
{{<prefix>}}company create A
{{<prefix>}}company info A
{{<prefix>}}company leave A
{{<prefix>}}company join A

covid19.description: View the status of the COVID-19 virus

play.description: Let Axel play a song for you!

logs.usage:
{{<prefix>}}logs set #{{channel}}
{{<prefix>}}logs events
{{<prefix>}}logs enable events.MessageDelete
{{<prefix>}}logs disable events.MessageDelete
{{<prefix>}}logs events config

clear.description: Choose a number of 1 to 1000 messages to be deleted from some people or everyone.

ban.description: Apply a ban to one or more users.

kick.description: Apply a kick to one or more users.

loop.description: Enable the **loop** mode of the song, queue or disable the **loop** mode.

blockbots.description: Block or unblock bots to enter the server.
